title: Tips for Using Twitch?
body:
I've tried many ADCs in my attempt to learn the role, and one has become my favorite. I know he's not exactly considered the strongest right now, but he just fits my playstyle, and I REALLY love his AAs. 

Needless to say, he's my favorite, and I want to make him work. However, I'm having a few problems.

1. This applies to any ADC but **my CSing is trash**. I've tried bot matches, but of course I can get 90%-100% of the CS then. The problem comes when I have 50 things dividing my attention and enemies harass and zoning me.

2. I **lose duels MOST of the time**, even when ahead, even mid/late game. Is that just the nature of the beast with Twitch?

3. Every champion, even the likes of {{champion:67}}, seems to **bully the poor rat early. How do I alleviate this?**. My main issue is being zoned from CS. I poke back and can trade decently but I go OOM very quickly, even when Expunging at only 3+ stacks, then get zoned.

4. I'll be using him anyways but just to know what I'm up against here, **is he still decent** and worth using in your opinion?

Thanks in advance!
